p: Hydroxyl and nitrogen rich group-containing tung oil-based ester (GEHTMA-1, GEHTMA-2, GEHTMA-3 and GEHTMA-4) plasticizers are prepared and used to replace dioctyl terephthalate (DOTP) [ 77]. Figure 17 and Table 1h,i,j show synthesis route and their chemical structure. GEHTMA-3 displays better mechanical properties and endows PVC resins with well-balanced properties of flexibility and strength, which are attributed to simultaneous introduction of hydroxyl, epoxy, benzene ring, ester and nitrogen rich groups into GEHTMA-3 structures.
